mdRecord.dcterms:description: Designed and built in 1894-1895 by Charles and William Church. South wing added in 1905. Added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1970 as part of the Cape May Historic District, and then listed as a National Historic Landmark District in 1976. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cape_May_Historic_District [work]
